experiences.description: I have continued as a Associate Software Engineer after my internship at Shellbeehaken Ltd. I have worked on several projects. My main tech stack here is NextJs, NodeJs, MongoDB.

I have completed my internship from shellbeehaken ltd. In the internship preriod I have learned html, css, javascript, git, react, mongodb, expressjs and nextjs. Worked on production projects in the 5th and 6th month.

This is my experience from Learnathon 2022 organized by Geeky Solutions. In this event I have learned Typescript, Angular, MongoDB, Dotnet Core, RabbitMQ, SignalR. I developed two projects using these technologies. One of them was a Whatsapp clone and the another one was a Twitter clone.
